text: "One Vision" is a 1985 song by Queen. It was taken from the 1986 movie Iron Eagle and is the leading single from their 12th studio album A Kind of Magic. It went to number 7 in the United Kingdom, number 61 in the United States, number 10 in Australia, number 5 in Ireland, number 26 in Germany, number 24 in Switzerland and number 21 in the Netherlands. == Track listings == 7" Single A Side. "One Vision" (Single Version) - 4:02 B Side. "Blurred Vision" - 4:41 12" Single A Side. "One Vision" (Extended Version) - 6:28 B Side. "Blurred Vision" - 4:41 ==References== Category:1985 songs Category:Queen (band) songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: One Vision
